thread.title: Baseball’s Tech Arm Weighs New Web Distribution Models for Sports TV
thread.title_full: Baseball’s Tech Arm Weighs New Web Distribution Models for Sports TV - WSJ

author: Alistair Barr
title: Baseball’s Tech Arm Weighs New Web Distribution Models for Sports TV
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.—Live sports has so far been a refuge for big media companies as the Internet eats into the traditional pay TV business. But that’s changing, according to Bob Bowman, head of business and media at Major League Baseball.
The viewing habits of young people are changing so drastically that there needs to be new approaches to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
